turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi Rita! I'm going to be rushing to my next meeting and won't have time to wait for my coffee, could you order my coffee order for me from Starbucks, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course! Which starbucks do you want me to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think the one on Huntington will be easiest for me as I can grab it right before I head to the meeting.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay sweet, what time is your meeting?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The meeting starts at 2:30.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, do you want to pick it up at 2 or 2:15?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll grab it at 2:15, just in case I get caught up here before the meeting, I don't want it to get too cold.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, gotcha. What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you order me a vanilla latte please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ah, switching it up form your usual, Iced blonde peppermint mocha... too cold out?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yah, it's a bit too cold out and I thought I'd switch it up today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Short, Tall, Grande or venti?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Tall please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk do you want with it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What kind do they have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Almond, coconut, nonfat, whole, 2% and soy.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whole milk please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want me to just order it through your account?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please, that way I get the points.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, your order has been placed at the Starbucks on Huntington and will be ready for pickup at 2:15. I put in your rewards number and they'll send the receipt to your phone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thanks Rita! See you later today at the meeting.
